title: GPT-5.3-Codex Now Generally Available
description: GitHub Copilot rolled out GPT-5.3-Codex, offering approximately 25% performance improvement in agentic coding tasks compared to GPT-5.2-Codex. The model significantly reduces wait times for complex, long-running workflows and is optimized for architecture design and automated refactoring.

community_feedback.quote: Codex is excellent at discovering errors and small inconsistencies. Claude Code is good at 'raw programming', but Codex is unbeaten at carefully and systematically discovering 'problems'
They better take significant action, or OpenAI will kill Claude Code
Reddit's programming community 'directly exploded' with reactions noting concerns about AI-generated code feeding back into training
